lb-6ef4.title: Spaceship Duel Evolution System
lb-6ef4.description: Rust program that evolves AI combatants for a 1v1 spaceship duel game with Asteroids-style mechanics, genetic reinforcement learning, and real-time visualization

lb-zww1.title: Project setup: Cargo.toml, dependencies, module structure
lb-zww1.description: Initialize Rust project with Cargo.toml, add core dependencies (macroquad for rendering, rand for RNG, serde for serialization), create module structure (game, physics, ai, evolution, render)
